text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
It's Rice Shower! Rice Shower is showing off! Crossing the goal 
with the first place!!

“Nikkei prize” in preparation for the Spring's 
“Emperor's Award”. Rice Shower regained her run 
form and finished the race in first place.

And as if to respond to that good run, Mejiro McQueen also won 
the “Osaka Cup” with a new course record.

Mejiro McQueen and Rice Shower have been training harder than 
ever while being conscious of each other.
And the day of the “Emperor's Award” finally came.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
In the 2nd frame, Number 3. It is the Jet Black Stayer, Rice 
Shower that blocked Mihono Bourbon's triple crown.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I have to follow McQueen-san… Follow her…

Even in front of many people, Rice 
Shower's eyes never averted away.

The feeling of wanting to win over Mejiro McQueen is transmitted 
to everyone watching from her eyes alone.
And then, the overwhelming number 1 in the popularity list

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
In the 8th frame, Number 14. The 1 most favourite to win the 
spring “Emperor's Award” It is the champion Mejiro McQueen who 
rises to the challenge of the 3 consecutive wins!

text_block_list.name: Cheers
text_block_list.text: (Cheering!!)

Even in front of the biggest cheers of the 
day, Mejiro McQueen never panicked.
It's because she also has a strong will to win.
It was a great cheer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ara, Trainer-san. Don't you have to go to Rice?
It's also McQueen's race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Heh, it's a trainer's view. But, please go to where Rice-san is.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure you will be satisfied with that much training, but I'm 
sure there will still be some worries.
You're really our ace. Prioritizing and thinking about Rice.
You're really our ace. Prioritizing and thinking about Rice.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That's right here, but it's different on the turf.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I will challenge this race with all my heart and soul. I will not 
pull any punches at all.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The 3 consecutive “Emperor Prize” win that everyone expects…. 
Those expectations above all are what gives me power.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I will definitely be the first to run through the goal.

You can see by looking at the expression of Mejiro McQueen that 
there is not a single point of hesitation in that thought. Mejiro 
McQueen will without a doubt run with all her might.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yeah, you can count on me.

When I finished talking to Mejiro McQueen, I ran towards Rice 
Shower who was walking in front of me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer-san…

Are you nervous? To relax, it seems to be a good idea to draw a 
horse girl 3 times in your palm and swallow it.

Are you nervous? To relax, it seems to be a good idea to draw a 
horse girl 3 times in your palm and swallow it.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haha, I've never heard of that.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm not feeling that nervous. But…. After all, it's a bit scary.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
A lot of people are cheering for McQueen, and I know that many 
people want to see 3 consecutive “Emperor Prize” wins.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
If Rice wins. everyone will be disappointed again and get angry 
and say “Don't do unnecessary things”. I know that.

It seems that you have enough spirit to win here, to concern 
yourself about such a worry.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Yeah, Even so, after all Rice still wants to win.
Her expression was as strong-willed as that of McQueen.

McQueen was the first person to say that Rice was going to run 
for the “Emperor Prize”.

McQueen was the first person to say that Rice was going to run 
for the “Emperor Prize”.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: McQueen-san…?

It seems that there is a “Scenery” that she wants to show you, 
one that can only be seen by runners.

It seems that there is a “Scenery” that she wants to show you, 
one that can only be seen by runners.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: To show Rice a “Scenery”…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: … I got it, I'll go to see that ”Scenery” properly.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Yeah, I will be going now, Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Each Horse Girl enters the gate. Which Horse Girl will be the 
winner of the Spring's “Emperor Prize”!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I have to follow McQueen-san… Follow her… I have to follow 
McQueen-san… Follow her…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
(That was not expected…. I didn't know 
Rice-san pressure was this much…)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Oops, Mejiro McQueen, who is aiming for the No. 1 and 3rd 
Consecutive title, is stopping in front of the gate here.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
(Still, as a Horse Girl of the Mejiro family, and as an Ace, I 
have to run with all my power).

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Mejiro McQueen finally enters the gate.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The Spring “Emperor Prize”, Aiming for the 
glory 3200m ahead, has just started!
